scripts.setup:redaction: cd server/services/redaction && if [ -d venv ]; then source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt; else python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt; fi
scripts.dev:redaction: cd server/services/redaction && if [ -f venv/bin/python ]; then venv/bin/python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000; else python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000; fi
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:redaction" --names "SERVER,CLIENT,REDACTION" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
